contents: Developed and maintained a back-office ReactJS Application and communicated regularly with users to identify their goals and needs.
Worked with the team to migrate a legacy microservice, taking ownership of the service using technologies such as: NestJS, PostgreSQL, AWS Database Migration Service.
Write and maintain unit tests using Jest framework and E2E tests using Cypress
Migrate a React application to AWS.
Developed, maintained features and took ownership of an existing React application.
Worked in an agile team of four developers creating technical solutions for a back-office Angular(up to v13) application.
Migrated an old legacy AngularJS application to Angular 2.
Write and maintain unit tests using Jasmine, which then later helped migrate to using Jest.
Maintained a back-office AngularJS application, fixing tech debt, fixing defects, updating project dependencies and writing unit tests.
Worked independently to develop client-side applications using AngularJS.
Maintain existing applications and implement additional functionality based on customers requirements.
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (2:1)
Final year project involves researching Games Development techniques and comparisons of various popular game engines at the time.
Computing(B), Mathematics(B), Electronics(A), AS-Level Sociology(B), GCSE Japanese(A*)
12 GCSEs between A* - C including Maths(A) and English(B)
